{{- $json := "" }} {{- $skin := "model/base/scripts.json" }} {{- $core := "_core/model/base/scripts.json" }} {{- $path := printf "static/script/ven-tail.css" -}} {{- if resources.Get $skin -}} {{- $json = $skin -}} {{- else -}} {{- $json = $core -}} {{- end -}} {{- with resources.Get $json -}} {{- $conf := . | transform.Unmarshal -}} {{- if and ( eq hugo.IsProduction true ) ( eq $conf.ven.tailwind true ) -}} {{- with resources.Get $path -}} {{- $opts := dict "minify" true -}} {{- with . | fingerprint -}} {{- end -}} {{- end -}} {{- end -}} {{- end -}}
